reports.description: City Hall Annual Thanksgiving Celebration and community gathering. Join us for food, music, and festivities on November 1st at 2:00 PM.
Dallas City Council Meeting - District 7 Open Forum. Residents invited to discuss local initiatives and voice concerns on November 2nd at 9:00 AM.
Mobile Vaccination Clinic at Fair Park community center. Free flu and COVID-19 vaccines available on November 3rd from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
Ribbon Cutting Ceremony for newly renovated Central Library expansion. Public invited to explore new facilities on November 4th at 1:00 PM.
Veterans Day Memorial Service honoring fallen service members. Ceremony begins at 10:00 AM on November 5th at Dallas Veterans Park.
Urban Planning Commission Meeting - Downtown Development Initiative. Discuss new zoning proposals for downtown Dallas on November 6th at 6:00 PM.
DMV Mobile Unit at South Dallas Community Center. Driver licenses and vehicle registrations processed on November 7th from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Dallas Parks Department celebrates 75th anniversary of White Rock Lake Park. Family celebration with activities and historical presentation on November 8th at 11:00 AM.
Free Tax Assistance Clinic for seniors and low-income residents. Expert tax preparers available on November 9th from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM at North Dallas Library.
Community Forum: Public Safety and Neighborhood Policing. City officials discuss new initiatives on November 10th at 7:00 PM at Lakewood Community Center.
Voter Registration Drive at Highland Hills Mall. Register to vote or update your registration on November 11th from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Building Dedication Ceremony for new Tech Hub at Dallas Business District. Celebrating innovation and economic growth on November 12th at 3:00 PM.
Environmental Sustainability Town Hall - Climate Action Plan Discussion. City leaders address climate initiatives on November 13th at 6:00 PM.
Mobile Health Clinic providing free checkups and health education. Services available on November 14th from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM at East Dallas Park.
Dallas ISD Building Dedication - New Roosevelt High School auditorium. Celebrating school district milestone on November 15th at 2:00 PM.
Public Hearing on proposed ordinances for small business development. City Council meets on November 16th at 9:00 AM.
Award Ceremony honoring community leaders and volunteers. Recognition event on November 17th at 6:00 PM at Dallas Convention Center.
Free Legal Clinic offering immigration and housing assistance. Attorneys available on November 18th from 1:00 PM to 5:00 PM at downtown location.
Parks Department Tree Planting Initiative across North Dallas neighborhoods. Hundreds of native trees to be planted on November 19th starting at 9:00 AM.
City Council District 5 Community Meeting discussing transportation improvements. Residents invited to share feedback on November 20th at 7:00 PM.
Thanksgiving Prep Fair - Food bank distribution and community support services. Services available on November 21st from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
Ribbon Cutting for South Dallas Recreation Center improvements. New facilities opening on November 22nd at 12:00 PM.
Celebrate 100th Year of Dallas High School with anniversary ceremony. Alumni and community members invited on November 23rd at 2:00 PM.
Housing and Community Development Forum addressing affordability. Public input on next housing initiatives on November 24th at 6:00 PM.
Workforce Development Job Fair with city employers. Meet employers and explore career opportunities on November 25th from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM.
Public Safety Commission Meeting reviewing 2025 crime statistics and prevention strategies. Meeting on November 1st at 5:00 PM.
Mobile Dental Clinic providing free cleanings and exams. Services for uninsured residents on November 2nd from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Economic Development Council Meeting discussing small business incentives. Meet with city officials on November 3rd at 3:00 PM.
Water Department Public Forum on conservation initiatives and infrastructure upgrades. Learn and discuss on November 4th at 6:00 PM.
Cultural Heritage Month Celebration at Fair Park. Showcase of local arts and traditions on November 5th from 12:00 PM to 7:00 PM.
Fire Department Open House and Safety Education. Tour facilities and learn fire safety on November 6th from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
Senior Citizens Day at Dallas Public Library featuring programs and activities. Free resources and socializing on November 7th at 1:00 PM.
Youth Services Commission Meeting addressing after-school programs and recreational activities. Meeting on November 8th at 4:00 PM.
Bike Dallas Community Ride promoting cycling and trails. Family-friendly ride on November 9th starting at 9:00 AM at White Rock Park.
Permit and Licensing Clinic for small business owners. Expert guidance on permits and regulations on November 10th from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM.
Public Health Awareness Campaign on diabetes and nutrition. Free screenings and workshops on November 11th from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Transportation and Mobility Forum discussing public transit improvements. City planners present on November 12th at 6:00 PM.
Community Cleanup Day along Trinity River. Volunteer to beautify our waterways on November 13th starting at 8:00 AM.
Education and Youth Development Summit featuring local educators and mentors. Networking and workshops on November 14th from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM.
Housing Authority Board Meeting addressing tenant rights and property improvements. Meeting on November 15th at 2:00 PM.
Parks and Recreation Master Plan Review with community input. Public meeting on November 16th at 5:00 PM.
Celebrate Dallas Police Department 50th anniversary of community policing program. Ceremony and reception on November 17th at 3:00 PM.
Homeless Outreach and Support Services Fair. Resources and assistance available on November 18th from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
Traffic Safety Council Meeting discussing intersection improvements and accident prevention. Meeting on November 19th at 4:00 PM.
Dallas Arts District Public Art Installation Ceremony. Unveiling new public sculptures on November 20th at 1:00 PM.
Code Enforcement and Property Standards Forum with neighborhood groups. Discuss housing standards on November 21st at 6:00 PM.
Library Expansion Grand Opening at East Dallas Branch. New collections and state-of-the-art facilities on November 22nd at 11:00 AM.
City Anniversary Celebration - Dallas Founded 150 Years Ago. Historical exhibits and festivities on November 23rd from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Environmental Protection Commission Meeting on air quality and sustainability goals. Meeting on November 24th at 3:00 PM.
Consumer Advocacy Day with city attorney's office providing tips on fraud prevention and consumer rights. Sessions on November 25th from 11:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
